property.name: eventCalendarCommandString
property.value: SELECT i.pubDate, i.title, id.description, i.all_day_event FROM item i INNER JOIN item_description id on i.item_id = id.item_id WHERE i.pubDate BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate AND (i.channel_id = @channelIdSpecial OR i.channel_id = @channelIdRegular)

property.name: eventCalendarDatesCommandString
property.value: SELECT i.pubDate, i.title FROM item i WHERE i.pubDate BETWEEN @startDate AND @endDate AND i.channel_id = @channelIdSpecial OR i.channel_id = @channelIdRegular
